mission-order-dto.instruction:
Refactor the Market Order system to use the standardized 'OrderDTO'. Replace raw dictionary usage in decisions and market submissions. Ensure Phase 6/7 compatibility.

mission-order-dto.title: Standardize Order DTO Contracts (TDL-028)
